I had a dream last night that an okapi and I built a hanging church on the face of a cliff.
zh: 我昨晚做梦，梦见我和一只霍加狓在悬崖峭壁上建了一座悬空教堂。

en: I'll be there until seven.
Last night's earthquake was very strong.
zh: 昨晚那场地震震得好厉害。

en: If you do this, you'll regret it for the rest of your life.
zh: 你要是真这么做，肯定会后悔一辈子的。

en: Do earthquakes happen often in Australia?
I can't stop until he tells me to.
zh: 除非他叫我停，否则我不能停。

en: My bicycle is newer than yours.
Thank you very much for your cooperation.
I've been learning Esperanto since six months ago, but I can understand it more than I can speak it.
zh: 我学世界语半年了，不过我听得懂的比能说出来的多。

en: This puzzle is too difficult for me.
zh: 这个拼图对我来说太难了。

en: Would it be OK if I turned off the radio?
Would it be OK if I turned the radio off?
zh: 我关了收音机没问题吧？

en: May I turn the radio off?
Would you mind if I turned the radio off?
zh: 介意我把收音机关了吗？

en: Tom came back as if nothing had happened.
zh: Tom像个没事人一样回来了。

en: Do you speak Sinhalese?
Can you stop standing behind me and looking at my hair whorl?
zh: 你能不能别老站在我后面看我的发旋儿？

en: On average, how many cups of coffee do you drink every day?
zh: 你平均每天喝几杯咖啡？

en: I read three books a week.
We're still up.
Tom is in trouble with his parents.
They're still up.
We're Canadians, and we love our country.
zh: 我们是加拿大人，我们热爱自己的国家。

en: I feel like an idiot for believing you.
zh: 我觉得自己竟然会相信你，真是个白痴。

en: Don't whine, do something!
What is your favorite soccer club?
zh: 你最喜欢的足球俱乐部是哪支？

en: "You're cute." "No, you're cute." "No, you're cute!" "No, you're cute!" "OK, I'm cute."
zh: “你很可爱。”“不，你才可爱。”“不，你可爱！”“不，明明是你最可爱！”“行吧，我可爱。”

en: I'm worried about his health.
zh: 我挺担心他的身体状况的。

en: The savings are completely exhausted.
"Do you know where the potato chips I left here are?" "No."
zh: “你知道我放这儿的薯片去哪儿了吗？”“不知道。”

en: "My stomach hurts." "How come? Did you eat something strange?" "No idea."
zh: “我肚子疼。”“怎么回事？吃坏肚子了吗？”“不知道啊。”

en: If you lie, I'll punish you.
zh: 你要是敢撒谎，我肯定收拾你。

en: Shut up already!
The taxi will be here soon.
I drove Tom to the station.
It's been raining for a while now. I wonder if somebody's heart is crying.
zh: 雨都下这么久了，不知道是不是谁的心在哭泣呢。

en: We'll be next.
Tom might've eaten something before he got here.
zh: Tom来这儿之前可能已经吃过东西了。

en: What happened to the bag of potato chips that was here?
zh: 刚才放在这儿的那袋薯片呢？

en: They are both from Australia.
zh: 他们两个都来自澳大利亚。

en: "Do you know where the cake I put in the fridge is?" "Ah, it's in my belly."
zh: “你知道我放在冰箱里的蛋糕哪儿去了吗？”“啊，在我肚子里呢。”

en: "I think I forgot to put money in my wallet." "Huh?" "I still have my cards, though...Ah, I don't have my wallet. I must've forgot it. Oh well." "You meant to leech from the start, didn't you?" "No, no, I actually forgot it."
zh: “我好像忘了往钱包里放钱了。”“哈？”“不过我卡还在……哎呀，我没带钱包。肯定是忘拿了。算了吧。”“你打一开始就是想蹭饭吧？”“不是不是，真忘了。”

en: I don't have any money in my wallet.
